text: <https://spin.d.pr/Cd4T44+> 218 users as of the 19th. The slow in growth is partly artificial - there are 14 users of the beta version of the extension(those people have the extension disabled or uninstalled to prevent conflict). Thank you guys for testing! _As always - remember rating the extension increases it’s visibility, increasing the number of users, increasing the number of people interested in contributing, and inspiring those who contribute to contribute more._
Really sharp drop-off at the end there

hahah oh i should note that that’s a bug in the reports early in the mornings it reports 0 people for yesterday(think it’s related to dealing with time zones, some of the data may not have finished collecting basically)
around 5pm-ish it actually shows data for that day
